1.content:
Lilly POV: Today was like any day I was gonna meet up with my friend Rachel we both loved to play duel monsters but I don't really play anymore due to what happen a year ago and it still hunts me to this day you see the reason why I don't really play anymore more is because a year ago when i was 14 years old i had to safe the world from an evil being trying to take over the world but when i was about to be defeated and according to my friends my eyes changed to color to bright orange and my voice got darker and all i wanted to do was watch my opponent but lucky my friends snapped m out of it before i did some i would regent. So now i just enjoy watching duel monsters but that's enough about the past lets get ready for the day today im wearing an white tank top with thin straps a pair and shorts and a black jacket after i grab my duel monster deck and go to the bath to brush my hair after im done in the bathroom i go to the kitchen and see that my mom and dad left me a note saying "you're breakfast is in the fridge me and your mom went to the card store to get in it ready for the tournament please come by to help out it should start after you're thing today with Rachel".


I open the fridge and see a plate filled with eggs beacon and a glass full of orange juice, when i finish my breakfast i hear a knock on the door i get up and put my plate and glass in the sink and i put my shoes on and see who is at the door

Rachel: "hey girl ready to go watch a duel between to pros"

Lilly: "yea of course this is gonna be fun also i cant hangout after cuz i have to help my parents with the tournament today"

we start walking and Rachel asked me if i had my deck on me which i said of course i do. we get to the dueling arena

Rachel: "are you ready Lilly for some fun"

Lilly: "yea it should be fun but i have a feeling you're up to something'

Rachel: (in a saarcastic voice) "me no never okay i may have done something but don't be mad"

Lilly: "what did you do"!

a judge walks up to them

Rachel: "well your about to find out'

Judge: "which one of you is Lilly Rose"

Lilly: "I am why what's going on"

Judge: "you're match will begin in 5 minutes please follow me and your friend can come as well"

Lilly: "WHAT this must be a misunderstanding im at a duelist, well i am but i haven't play in a year"

Judge: "oh what should i tell your opponent you forfeit"

Rachel: "wait Lilly please play i promise you'll do find im here for you"

Lilly: "find I'll duel but if i start going into that dark place and start changing again you have to get me out of there promise me that"

Rachel; "of course i will plus you'll kick butt anyway"

with all that out of the way me and Rachel head to the back and i see the duel disk sitting on the table the judge says to put it on and get my deck ready and then says when your ready please go though those doors. I put on the duel disk and start walking to the doors and push them open an elevator takes us to the stage. When we reach the top Rachel goes to the side line and i stand at one end of the dueling area my opponent shows up and oh my gosh i know him from school his name is josh and he always asks me out in the weirdest ways but other then that he is pretty cool but i didn't know he also played duel monsters. I hope he doesn't recognize me

Josh: "let's have a good duel... hold up Lilly is that you but wait a i thought you stop playing duel monsters"

Lilly: I wave nervously at him and say "yea this is Rachel's idea not my but yea let's have fun"

the announcer started to talk and said i would go first then Josh we shuffled each others decks and then drew five cards the announcer said duelist ready we both nodded and then we started

Lilly: "I'll start my turn by playing red-eyes fusion this lets me fusion summon one fusion monster with red-eyes listed as a material so I'll send red-eyes black dragon and dark magician in order to summon red-eyes dark dragoon next I'll set two cards face down and end my turn"

Josh: "oh shot i didn't know you had that card but whatever i draw for turn let's see what to do i guess I'll set three card face down and end my turn"


Lilly: "that's it alright guess I'll go then i draw I'll play dark magical I'll add secrets of dark magic to my hand next I'll activate one of my face downs it eternal soul and i choose to bring bac my dark magician in my graveyard"

Josh: "then I'll activate mystical space typhoon too blow up your trap card"

Lilly: "then i activate my dragoon's effect to stop your MST and he grins 1000 attack points next ill discard one card and special summon this card apprentice illusion magician and using her effect i search my deck for a dark magician then i use secrets of dark magic to fuse my dark magician in my hand and my illusion magician together to summon the dark magicians next I'll enter my battle phase and attack you with my dark magicians"

that takes josh down to 5200 life points

Lilly: "next I'll attack with dark magician bring you down to 2700 life points and if you cant stop my last attack i win now go re-eyes dark dragoon attack and end this duel"
1.title: Saturday Tournament
